tool_description: An API provides Ontario Go Train Delay information
title: Go Train Delay

api_list.name: Search by date ranges
api_list.description: This is the end point that provides the elastic search capabilities to search the delay data by the date ranges.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com/date/_search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Delays
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com/delays/{page_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com/date/_search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
